title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 106.7 - Interim allocations of joint expenses
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 106.7 - Interim allocations of joint expenses

State Regulations

It is permissible to apportion expenses between companies during the year on the basis of methods and procedures other than those prescribed herein, provided allocations of corrected amounts, calculated in accordance with Parts 105 through 109 of this Title, are made in time for entry in the annual statement. Notes

106.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
